title: Ticket #7678: Add a callout for a job to prepare container environment
description:
As part of our effort to improve HTCondor's Singularity support so that it can manage container launches instead of glideinWms, we want HTCondor to implement a pre-Singularity (container) invocation call-out. This would allow a pilot job to make customizations to the run time environment of the payload.

Customizations allowed should include

  1. Changes files in the job sandbox
  2. (What else does glideinwms need? environment vars? command line? OSG folks who know please edit or add remarks)
remarks:

We need to ask Edgar if/when this will still actually be needed, after our other changes to remove job wrappers are implemented.
